description: Generates unit squares unitless for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for generate_unit_squares_unitless
result = generate_unit_squares_unitless(data)

educational_standards.description: Measure areas by counting unit squares in square feet \((ft^{2})\).
Given the area and a side, find the missing side length.
Represent whole-number products as rectangular areas in mathematical reasoning.
Exhibit rectangles with the same area and different perimeters.

educational_standards.display_name: Area, Perimeter and Side Length Word Problems
educational_standards.description: Solve word problems involving area, perimeter, and side length.
